title: First time playing a champ and getting a pentakill
body:
I've seen numerous threads of people's first pentakills but I experienced a rare phenomenon (for me at least) earlier today. I rolled Brand in ARAM. I'd never even tried him out in a custom before. Near the end of the game, I pentakilled with him. I even had amazing teammates who made sure to pull back and let me have the final kill.

So fellow GDers, anyone pentakill the first time playing a champion before?
